title: Creamy Vegan Herb Salad Dressing
directions: Place all of the ingredients, including just a bit of salt and pepper, to the bowl of a food processor fitted with the blade attachment.
Pulse until incorporated, then blend on medium speed until smooth. Taste and season with more salt, pepper, and hot sauce to taste. You may also choose to add a bit more lemon or vinegar.
Chill the dressing before serving as a salad dressing or as a vegetable dip. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to four days.
ingredients: Few dashes of hot sauce, to taste
